entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who is known for being strict and having a grudge against Harry. He has fathomless black eyes that can bore into people's souls.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts who is accused by Snape of stealing from his private stores.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend and classmate, who took the boomslang skin for the Polyjuice Potion in their second year.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who stole the gillyweed from Snape's private stores.

relationships.description: Snape accuses Harry of stealing from his private stores, specifically boomslang skin and gillyweed.
Hermione took the boomslang skin for the Polyjuice Potion in their second year.
Dobby stole the gillyweed from Snape's private stores.
